body:
MEGA SCRIM! MEGA SCRIM! MEGA SCRIM!

*come to avicus teamspeak (chat #4) early and you get a free bonus request for alex (4lextr) to sing any song

title: DID SOMEOME SAY MEGA SCRIM???! :O

replies.body: Can these threads be banned please? Especially if staff are spamming this sort of stuff every few days. If you're going to hold an event, actually present it professionally

replies.body:
It's not an event, it's just to tell people.
If this gets banned it will be the most stupid thing ever lmao

replies.body:
It shouldn't be banned.
There should just be one centralised thread where people can just bump it if they want to advertise their small event.

That way people can still tell others about there scrims while decreasing spam on the forums.
